analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that displays a list of initiatives fetched from a Vuex-style store and renders each item using a CardInitiativeItem component.
analysis.Purpose: Acts as the 'Initiatives' page in the governance module, responsible for loading and displaying all initiatives and providing a link to create a new one.

Components.name: Initiatives.vue
Components.role: Page component that fetches data on mount and renders a list of initiatives.

Components.name: CardInitiativeItem
Components.role: Presentational component responsible for rendering the details of a single initiative.

Functions.name: onMounted callback
Functions.purpose: Lifecycle hook that runs after component is mounted to fetch all initiatives.
Functions.behavior: Calls initiativesActions.getAllInitiatives(), then assigns the result from initiativesState.all to the local reactive variable.

analysis.Usage: Imported as a route component in the router configuration under the name 'Initiatives'. Rendered when navigating to the initiatives list page. Its child component CardInitiativeItem is passed individual initiative objects via props.
Notes: Uses the Vue 3 <script setup> Composition API syntax.
No error handling or loading state is implemented â€“ could be added for robustness.
No scoped or global styles defined within this file.
Relies on a store pattern (initiativesActions / initiativesState) that should already be initialized.
